name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ricardo GUERRO (Guerra), Appellant

judges: Before ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
Chief Justice FLAHERTY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ricardo GUERRO (Guerra), Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Chief Justice FLAHERTY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: William M. Shreve, for R. Guerro.
James Patrick Barker, Williamsport, Eric Russell Augustine, Harrisburg, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
785 A.2d 992
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ricardo GUERRO (Guerra), Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 15, 2001.
Decided Dec. 6, 2001.
William M. Shreve, for R. Guerro.
James Patrick Barker, Williamsport, Eric Russell Augustine, Harrisburg, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
Before ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
